p: An unpaired t-test was used to compare rumen SCFAs levels as well as the abundance of bacterial taxonomic groups, respectively, between samples from calves fed the EO supplemented diet and calves fed the control diet. The t-test was conducted using the online GraphPad Software ( https://www.graphpad.com/quickcalcs/ttest1.cfm). Pearson correlation coefficients and associated P values were calculated using Microsoft Excel. Means of two groups were considered to be significantly different when P â‰¤ 0.05.
